name: Balmora Balconyhouse
summary:
Located in Balmora\'s Canal West Manor District, BalconyHouse is a stately structure constructed in fine Hhaluu tradition. It is attractively decorated, upscale but not overwhelming, comfortable and designed to meet character needs.
Features: High capacity storage containers; generous treasure display areas; fully equipped laboratory; attractive
description:
Located in Balmora\'s Canal West Manor District, BalconyHouse is a stately structure constructed in fine Hhaluu tradition. It is attractively decorated, upscale but not overwhelming, comfortable and designed to meet character needs.
Features: High capacity storage containers; generous treasure display areas; fully equipped laboratory; attractive layout and decor; landscaped balcony with beautiful views, interior faithful to exterior; location steps from Town Center. Yes there are a multitude of Balmora mods out already but... you gotta see this one:)
author: Ravensong

name: Pack Zebra
summary:
Places a herder with pack zebras in the Zainab Camp. You can buy
a pack zebra from the herder.

The pack zebra is controlled through dialogue topics. You can display
a status report that includes the zebra's health, restorative inventory
items and type of follow mode. You can command the zebra to follow or
follow outdoors only. I
description:
Places a herder with pack zebras in the Zainab Camp. You can buy
a pack zebra from the herder.

The pack zebra is controlled through dialogue topics. You can display
a status report that includes the zebra's health, restorative inventory
items and type of follow mode. You can command the zebra to follow or
follow outdoors only. In follow mode, the zebra will follow you wherever
you go. In follow outdoors only mode, when you enter an interior cell,
the zebra will wait at the door for your return. If the zebra is in either
follow mode and you levitate, the zebra will stay at its current position.
If you water walk and the zebra is following, it too will water walk.
Feeding the zebra 2 small kwama eggs or 1 large kwama egg will restore
its health. The eggs can be in either the player's or zebra's inventory.
If the zebra is poisoned, it will eat rat meat from its inventory to
cure itself.

The Almsivi and Divine Intervention spells have been enhanced. They now
have the power to teleport both the PC and a pack zebra.

name: Septim Gold and Dwemer Dumacs
summary: Morrowind Septim Coin Gold Replacer now With Dumacs (Dwemer Coins)
description:
[center][/center][center][youtube]U2NzJqITz2A[/youtube][/center][center]﻿[/center]

*****************************************************************
                          The Elder Scrolls III
                            MORROWIND plugin
                  Septim Gold & Dwemer Dumacs v8.0
   
  by StaticNation
*****************************************************************
Index:
1. About this mod
2. Installation
3. Playing the Plugin
4. Save Games
5. Credits & Usage
*****************************************************************
     1. ABOUT THIS MOD
*****************************************************************
This Mod replaces the gold coins in Morrowind with the Coin with 2k High-def Textures based on actual photos of a collectors edition coin. 

    8.0 Whats New
Normals and Specular (Bump and Gloss) maps repathed and renamed to be better compatible with OpenMW
Darkfri's various patches updated to current path and packaged in the mod now.

these patches cover:
﻿- Animated Morrowind
﻿- Hold It
﻿- Holidays Across Tamriel - Vvardenfell
﻿- Passage of Prayers - High Fane Corridor Overhaul﻿
*****************************************************************
     2. INSTALLING THE PLUGIN
*****************************************************************
BAIN Installer,
Install 00 Core, then 01 OpenMW if you use OpenMW,
optional textures and mesh replacers for various mod compatibility are included
use them as needed and to taste.

Package is now pluginless, I suggest a mod organizer such as MO2 or Wrye Mash to 
install/uninstall.

*****************************************************************
     5. Credits & Usage
*****************************************************************
- Original Coin Meshes - Hendalf (original no longer used)
- Stacked Coin Meshes - Zobator (original no longer used)
- Thinner Stacked Coin Meshes + Gloss/Bumps - StaticNation
- Thinner Stacked Coin Meshes (No Shine for OpenMW) - StaticNation (optional)
- Gold Shader Texture - vtastek
- Top, Side, Bottom Textures - StaticNation, Vtastek edited side for better color balance with shader and lighting
- Dwemer Coin Textures - InsanitySorrow
- White Dwemer Coin Textures - StaticNation (optional texture based off insanitys)
- Original Dwemer Mesh - InsanitySorrow
- Editied Dwemer Mesh for Import - StaticNation
- Fixed PPL for Dwemer Mesh - Remiros
- Fixed Z pos on Dwemer Mesh - StaticNation
- Gloss, Bump maps - StaticNation (With Thanks to vtastek and EJ-12 for guidance on getting these working)
- Rough Septim Texture Option - qwertquit
- Patched meshes - Darkfri, updated - StaticNation
